title: Chicken tikka masala
description: Marinating the meat makes all the difference so don't be tempted to skip that step. If you want a lighter curry, swap some of the cream for natural yoghurt.
ingredients: 4 chicken breasts, skinned, boned and cubed
2.5cm/1in piece of fresh root ginger, finely chopped
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 tbsp chopped fresh coriander, plus extra to garnish
1 red chilli, seeds removedand finely chopped
basmati rice, cooked according to packet instructions
